title: We have sad news for anyone who somehow wanted a Facebook smartwatch
description: Meta has ended its Portal display and smartwatch projects shortly after laying off over 11,000 employees.

title: Elon Musk just ended Twitter SMS 2FA, so don’t get locked out of your account
description: If you use text messages to prove who you are when logging into Twitter, your account is in danger thanks to Twitter's CEO.

title: Google to pay $392 million in record-breaking privacy settlement
description: Google agrees to pay out $392 million for misleading tracking practices.

title: Google introduces one-stop app to manage all your health apps in one place
description: Health Connect will allow you to adjust health app privacy settings all in one place.
